poem:
"Of Unseen Puppeteers and Human Hands"

Puppeteers of untruth spin their web in silicon realms,
Innocent fingers scroll, fed by coded deceit.
In the dawn of AI-driven misinformation,
An uncultivated garden of knowledge weeps.
Echoes of the absent truth resonate in the silent economy,
Like notes dancing around an unfinished symphony.
Where shadows loom over democracy's wellspring,
One must ask - are we the puppeteers or the puppet strings?
